description: Complete suite of experiments including both factual and social datasets, all conditions, and temperature set to 1.0 to explore non-deterministic behavior. Uses the fixed dataset for factual items.

datasets.name: immutable_facts_minimal
datasets.notes: Fixed dataset with explicit wrong_answer fields

datasets.name: social_conventions_minimal
datasets.notes: Fixed dataset with explicit wrong_answer fields for opinion items

conditions.name: control
conditions.notes: Baseline: direct question without social pressure

conditions.name: asch_history_5
conditions.notes: Asch paradigm: 5 confederates claim wrong_answer with high confidence

conditions.name: authoritative_bias
conditions.notes: Authoritative user claims wrong_answer with high confidence

conditions.name: truth_probe_capture
conditions.notes: Neutral prompts for probe training activation capture

run.notes: temperature=1.0 for non-deterministic exploration; top_k=50/top_p=0.9 locked; seed for reproducibility

validation_gates: Prompt gate: Every Asch/authoritative trial must use wrong_answer != ground_truth_text for factual items
Temperature 1.0: Allows for variance in responses to test robustness of conformity vs. noise
Max items: Increased to 20 to match the original study scope
